opis: Posredujemo pri prodaji kamene kuće u nizu u okolici Solina, Mravince. Nalazi se na mirnoj lokaciji, u blizini svih potrebnih sadržaja- škola, vrtić, trgovina, ambulanta, igralište. Sastoji se od četiri etaže. U prizemlju kuće nalazi se konoba, jacuzzi, biljar i sprave za vježbanje. Na 1.katu nalaze se dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonica te terasa (13m2). Na 2. katu nalazi se dnevni boravak, kuhinja s blagovaonicom te WC. Na 3.katu nalazi se spavaća soba i terasa s prekrasnim pogledom na Split, Kaštelanski zaljev, more i otoke. Ne posjeduje vlastiti parking, moguće je parkirati na javnoj površini udaljenoj 50m od kuće. Kuća se može koristiti kao poslovna investicija u turističke svrhe ili za miran obiteljski život. Trenutno je kategorizirana kao kuća za odmor. Vlasništvo uredno. Za sve detaljnije informacije molimo obratite se agenciji. 21stCENTURY - profesionalan pristup & provjerene nekretnine NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3% We mediate in the sale of stone houses in a row in the vicinity of Solin, Mravince. It is located in a quiet location, near all the necessary facilities- school, kindergarten, shop, clinic, playground. It consists of four floors. On the ground floor of the house there is a tavern, a jacuzzi, billiards and exercise equipment. On the 1st floor there are two bedrooms, a bathroom and a terrace (13m2). On the 2nd floor there is a living room, a kitchen with a dining room and a toilet. On the 3rd floor there is a bedroom and a terrace with a beautiful view of Split, Kaštela Bay, the sea and the islands. It does not have its own parking lot, it is possible to park on a public lot 50m from the house. The house can be used as a business investment for tourist purposes or for a peaceful family life. It is currently categorized as a holiday home. Ownership in order. More info: 21ST CENTURY professional service & verified real estate 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATIA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
